description: A neutral continuation pattern with converging trendlines - lower highs and higher lows. Represents indecision between buyers and sellers. Breakout direction typically continues prior trend, but can reverse.

structure: Breakout ideally occurs 1/2 to 3/4 way to apex
volume: Volume should contract as triangle develops
Declining volume shows consolidation, not distribution
Strong volume spike on breakout critical for direction
Volume pattern less directional than other triangles
indicators: MACD may oscillate around zero line
Prior trend context matters for breakout prediction
timeframe: Reliable on daily and weekly charts

invalidation_signals: No volume on breakout (false break risk very high)
Breakout occurs too early (<1/3 way through pattern)
common_mistakes: Expecting symmetrical triangles to resolve quickly
Not having plan for both directions

trade_setup.entry: Enter in breakout direction with strong volume confirmation
trade_setup.stop_loss: Below support for long, above resistance for short
trade_setup.target: Measure triangle height at base, project from breakout
